menu_items.name: Peking Duck
menu_items.description: marinated duck roasted crisp and served with pancake and green onion with special sauce

menu_items.name: Crispy Duck
menu_items.description: boneless duck meat, lightly breaded, deep fried to a crisp, topped with vegetables in chef's special sauce

menu_items.name: Duck with Vegetables
